Daniel T. Watts Awarded President Emeritus Status Despite Never Serving as President

May 12, 2025 by Warren Gazette Staff

Daniel T. Watts, who won a contested 2003 election but never served as president due to a Judicial Board ruling, has been granted President Emeritus status by the Warren College Student Council.

Resolution Awards Posthumous President Emeritus Status to Erik Ward

May 12, 2025 by Warren Gazette Staff

A resolution to posthumously honor Warren College alumnus Erik Ward with the title of President Emeritus was passed unanimously by the Warren College Student Council.

Resolution Celebrating AAPI Heritage Month Passes Unanimously

May 12, 2025 by Warren Gazette Staff

A resolution celebrating Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month was passed unanimously by the UCSD AS Senate and College Councils.
